Database - package Database
 
DBAppointments - Class in Database
This class is the SQL connection to the appointments table that does the data CRUD stuff.
DBAppointments() - Constructor for class Database.DBAppointments
 
DBConnection - Class in Database
This class creates and closes the connection to a MySQL Database of the user's choice by changing the variable parameters.
DBConnection() - Constructor for class Database.DBConnection
 
DBContacts - Class in Database
This class is the SQL connection to the contacts table for data retrieval.
DBContacts() - Constructor for class Database.DBContacts
 
DBCountry - Class in Database
This class is the SQL connection to the countries table for data retrieval.
DBCountry() - Constructor for class Database.DBCountry
 
DBCustomers - Class in Database
This class is the SQL connection to the customers table that does the data CRUD stuff.
DBCustomers() - Constructor for class Database.DBCustomers
 
DBDivision - Class in Database
This class is the SQL connection to the first_level_divisions table for data retrieval.
DBDivision() - Constructor for class Database.DBDivision
 
DBQuery - Class in Database
This class contains a prepared statement object for SQL usage.
DBQuery() - Constructor for class Database.DBQuery
 
DBUsers - Class in Database
This class allows the users table to be queried for login validation.
DBUsers() - Constructor for class Database.DBUsers
 
deleteAppointment(int) - Static method in class Database.DBAppointments
This method deletes an Appointment by the specified Appointment ID.
deleteCustomer(int) - Static method in class Database.DBCustomers
This method deletes an existing Customer by specified customer ID.
DeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controllers.CustomersController
This method deletes the selected customer when clicked .
Division - Class in Models
This class is an object constructor used to create Division objects in the database and get/set their values.
Division(int, String, int) - Constructor for class Models.Division
